title: Brooklyn Christmas
description: Their mission: saving ChristmasTwo exciting new True Blue K-9 Unit: Brooklyn novellasIn Holiday Stalker by Laura Scott, Max Santelli and his furry partner protect the team’s tech guru, Eden Chang, when she becomes the target of deadly attention. And in Gift-Wrapped Danger by Maggie K. Black, army veteran Adam Jolly teams up with Noelle Orton and her keen-nosed K-9 to take down someone smuggling drugs using toys donated to the single dad’s Christmas charity.
author: Laura     Scott
